entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
